trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 관련 사용자 인터페이스의 컬렉션을 관리 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each Adorner can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: 각 표시기 사용 될 수 있고 사용 하지 않도록 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Only enabled Adorner objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 사용된 표시기 개체만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> 에서 적중 횟수 테스트와 그리기 메시지를 받을

trans-unit.source: An Adorner can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 인터페이스 간의 프록시 표시기를 볼 수 있습니다 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>개체 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> 이루어진 관련된 요소

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [동작 서비스 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Adorner constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: 표시기 생성자에서는 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>및 기본적으로 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> 연관는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>에 추가 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>,이 속성을 설정 하는 컬렉션 있도록 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> 다시 호출할 수</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> 연관 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> 를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the Enabled property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: Enabled 속성 이면 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>클래스 송신할 `HitTest` 및 `Paint` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> 메시지</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>를 하는 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> 고, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: 강제로 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> 해당 adorner 창을 새로 고칩니다.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 강제로 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> 내에서 표시기 창을 새로 고치려면는 주어진 <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 무효화할 영역입니다.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 강제로 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> 내에서 표시기 창을 새로 고치려면는 주어진 <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> 을 무효화 하 합니다.
